prompt:
Nurse: I'm glad to hear that. How about a new or worsening dry cough?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's good news. Have you noticed any increased swelling in your feet, ankles, stomach, or legs?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's great to hear. Have you gained more than 2 pounds in the past day or 5 pounds in the past week?

Patient: No. I haven't.

Nurse: That's good to hear. Lastly, have you been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: No.

responses.gpt4: That's good to hear. We just performed a simple CHF assessment which can help you keep track of your symptoms at home. Do you have any questions about how to do this yourself?
responses.our_model: That's good to hear. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to keep an eye on these symptoms at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be a bit complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?
